meanings.definition: A type of Italian turnover made of pizza dough folded in half and filled with cheese, meat, and vegetables.
meanings.sent1: I ordered a delicious calzone for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The calzone at the restaurant was filled with gooey cheese and savory meat.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that his calzone was so big, it could feed a whole family.
meanings.sent4: The calzone was a warm, cheesy pocket of goodness.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked calzone filled the room.

meanings.definition: To make or eat a calzone.
meanings.sent1: I love to calzone with my friends on weekends.
meanings.sent2: Let's calzone together at the new Italian restaurant.
meanings.sent3: After a long day, I just want to relax and calzone.
meanings.sent4: She calzoned happily, savoring each bite of the delicious meal.
meanings.sent5: Calzoning with friends always brings joy to my heart.
